txt.en: Scouting locations are along the base of the Morgai in Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should scout the location.
Ingold has been getting reports that bands of spiders are crossing the Morgai from Lhingris into Dor Amarth. He asks you to patrol the border.
Scouting locations are along the base of the Morgai in Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should scout the location.
Scouting locations are along the base of the Morgai in Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should scout the location.
Ingold can be found at the Ruins of DÃ­ngarth in Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
Talk to Ingold
Scout the location for spiders
Stand your ground and defeat the spider swarm
You should defeat the incoming spider swarm!
You have successfully defeated the spider swarm
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not flee from where you stand</rgb>
You see a swarm of spiders approaching from the Morgai!
Scout the location for spiders
You have fled the battle!
'You have successfully fended off a group of spiders descending the Morgai? I am glad you were our first line of defence! The scuttling creatures were no match for you.'

'I have heard tales of crawling things in the Morgai. Scuttling, venomous creatures roam through the valley. Some have recently spotted large spiders along the Morgai's ridge. I fear these horrid spiders are becoming bolder as they explore areas near the valley of Lhingris.\n\n'Will you go scout the base of the Morgai here in Dor Amarth in search of any intruders?'
Scout the location for spiders
You find nothing to report to Ingold here
All is quiet here
The Lhingris Threat
